Class DocumentMutationController

java.lang.Object
kp.resource.server.b.controllers.DocumentMutationController
@Controller public class DocumentMutationController extends Object
Controller responsible for handling document mutation operations.

      Returns:
      the result of the mutation containing the mutated document id
